used and type of filet stitch grid you make a no 10 thread and a 1 x 1 filet grid 1 post stitch & 1 block or space will produce a much small square than using a worsted weight yarn and a 1 x 2 filet grid 1 post stitch & 2 blocks or spaces i have included the basic instructions for making a 1 x 1 filet grid and a 1 x 2 filet grid the sizing information is for a 1 x 2 filet grid use the hook required for the size of yarn/ thread chosen remember you could also use the graphs for tapestry crochet beaded crochet tunisian filet crochet embroidery even knitting go to nezumiworld
